definitions.text: a dark-skinned member of a race of people living in Australia when Europeans arrived
an indigenous person who was born in a particular place
examples: the art of the natives of the northwest coast
the Canadian government scrapped plans to tax the grants to aboriginal college students

definitions.text: of or pertaining to members of the indigenous people of Australia
characteristic of or relating to people inhabiting a region from the beginning
having existed from the beginning; in an earliest or original stage or state
examples: primal eras before the appearance of life on earth
